com.pkrete.xrd4j.common.message

Class ErrorMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pkrete.xrd4j.common.message.ErrorMessage

  • public class ErrorMessage
extends Object
    This class represents an error message returned by the service producer or by the security server.
    Author:
    Petteri Kivim√§ki

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErrorMessage(String faultCode, String faultString)
      Constructs and initiates a new non-technical SOAP error message.
      ErrorMessage(String faultCode, String faultString, String faultFactor, Object detail)
      Constructs and initiates a new standard SOAP error message.

        public ErrorMessage(String faultCode,

        Constructs and initiates a new non-technical SOAP error message.
        Parameters:
        faultCode - code for identifying the fault
        faultString - human readable explanation of the fault

      • ErrorMessage

        public ErrorMessage(String faultCode,
            String faultString,
            String faultFactor,
            Object detail)
        Constructs and initiates a new standard SOAP error message.
        Parameters:
        faultCode - code for identifying the fault
        faultString - human readable explanation of the fault
        faultFactor - identity of the component that created the error message
        detail - application specific error information related to the Body element
